query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Requirements traceability matrix for the new-concept, single-tube reactor.
result.description: The deliverable includes a set of requirements and specifications needed for the reactor design. It is produced by T3.1.

project.title: Direct co-processing of CO2 and water to sustainable multicarbon energy products in novel photocatalytic reactor ​

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

programme.title: Next generation of renewable energy technologies

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

result.title: Scientific & Technical management report I
result.description: Initial report on scientific and technical matters, as addressed in WPs 2, 3, 4 and 5, related to the implementation of the project. It is produced as part of T1.2 and elaborates on the progress, findings and challenges faced by the Work Package Leaders while recommendations are also formulated.

result.title: Software prototype that can be used as DSS to evaluate the magnitude of the risks of the hazards and rank them for internal use
result.description: D1.2 (M36): Software prototype that can be used as DSS to evaluate the magnitude of the risks of the hazards and rank them for internal use. The prototype integrates the database on microbiological and chemical risks and risk ranking procedures including quantitative measures (based on DALY) and semi-quantitative scores following a multicriteria decision procedure.

result.title: Data Management Plan updates
result.description: This deliverable is related to Task 1.1. Data Management Plan will set the basis for the Dissemination and exploitation but also the procedures for the sharing of data of the project. This is the first version to be revised during the course of the project.An update is foreseen during month 48.

result.title: Software prototype that can be used as DSS for hazard identification for internal use
result.description: D1.1 (M36): Software prototype that can be used as DSS for hazard identification for internal use. The prototype integrates the database on microbiological and chemical hazards and the systematic procedures to identify hazards.
